p: Golmakani and Rezaei (2008) used MAHD method with 990 W power to extract essential oil from thyme. In a study published by Wu Wang et al. (2010), with 800 W power, MAHD method was successfully used to extract essential oil from mango flowers. Also, Karakaya et al. (2012) obtained essential oil from rosemary with 622 W power, and in year 2013 Khanavi et al. extracted essential oil from thyme with 225 W power using MAHD method.
